meanings.sent1: She suffers from a headache every day.
meanings.sent2: He suffers when he accidentally touches the hot stove.
meanings.sent3: The cat suffers a dramatic sneeze after smelling the pepper.
meanings.sent4: The old tree suffers under the weight of the heavy snow.
meanings.sent5: The injured bird suffers quietly in the nest.

meanings.sent1: The students suffer through a long and boring lecture.
meanings.sent2: She suffers the cold wind as she waits for the bus.
meanings.sent3: The puppy suffers a bath but enjoys the towel rub after.
meanings.sent4: The car suffers the bumpy road with its worn-out suspension.
meanings.sent5: The hiker suffers the steep climb but enjoys the view at the top.

meanings.definition: To be affected by something negative
meanings.sent1: The crops suffer from the lack of rain.
meanings.sent2: He suffers from allergies during the spring season.
meanings.sent3: The phone suffers a cracked screen after a fall.
meanings.sent4: The town suffers a power outage during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The dog suffers from loneliness when left alone at home.

meanings.definition: To allow or permit something negative to happen
meanings.sent1: She suffers her children to eat ice cream before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He suffers his friend to borrow his favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The teacher suffers the students to use their phones for research.
meanings.sent4: The company suffers the employees to take breaks when needed.
meanings.sent5: The park suffers visitors to feed the ducks by the pond.
